title: Improving soybean success: Coastal soy agronomy workshops & online manual

tasks.task: Attending an agronomy workshop on soybean production
subtasks: Arriving at the workshop venue in Bundaberg
Listening to presentations on soybean production cycle
Discussing soybean consumption trends with agronomists
Learning about soybean processing in Australia
Understanding soybean cultivation in different regions
Examining storage challenges for soybeans
Reviewing the online soybean production manual
Engaging in detailed discussions with speakers
Receiving printed notes from the workshop
Accessing and navigating the online manual modules
Network with other attendees for professional connections

tasks.task: Developing a soybean farming business in a sugar cane system
subtasks: Researching soybean rotation as a maintenance crop
Planning soybean cultivation as a secondary income source
Understanding the importance of soybeans in maintaining soil health
Considering soybean's role in diversifying farm income
Evaluating the economic benefits of soybean farming

tasks.task: Managing soybean storage in coastal regions
subtasks: Assessing storage challenges due to high humidity
Exploring technology solutions for automated aeration
Implementing storage systems that prevent mold and spoilage
Monitoring soybean moisture content regularly
Following best practices for long-term storage
